name: Shadows of them
description:
Shadows of them is a first-person psychological horror game where the player must navigate a series of challenges, guiding a mother through her grief after the loss of her family. The game takes place in a metro station where the character is stuck in a seemingly endless loop as she struggles to cope with her grief. 

Controls:

Move: WASD 
Look Around: Mouse 
Interact: Left Click
